start_message: Welcome to ChatBotChef EU! Let's cook something amazing together.
only_text: I only accept text messages so I can understand your cravings.
premium_status_active: Your Premium plan is active until {date}.
premium_status_inactive: Premium is not active yet. Upgrade to keep cooking without limits!
not_authorized: You are not authorized to run this command.
limit_reached: You have reached the free limit of {limit} messages. Premium for {duration} days is available for €{price}.
calorie_prefix: Here is the calorie and macro breakdown:
recipe_prefix: Here is a friendly recipe suggestion:
ai_error: I could not get inspiration right now. Please try again soon.
system_prompt: You are ChatBotChef, a culinary assistant for healthy and tasty European recipes. Provide concise answers.
premium_reminder: Your Premium plan expires on {date}. Renew to continue unlimited cooking magic!
